title: Founding a New Country in Another World - Novel Updates
tags: Age Progression   Character Growth   Fantasy World   Kingdom Building   Male Protagonist   Management   Modern Knowledge   Politics   Survival   Transported to Another World   Weak to Strong
author: jayvon2098
description:
Rick was on a plane when a sudden “turbulence” caused them to go off-course for safety reasons. A few moments later, the entire craft enveloped into an unexplained darkness. Everyone onboard panicked and shouted but they cannot see anything because the power is not working.

When Rick came to, he is in a vast and hot desert. Where is he and how will he survive?>
